item.title: SmartSecChain-SDN: A Blockchain-Integrated Intelligent Framework for Secure and Efficient Software-Defined Networks
item.description:
Summary

  • Proposes SmartSecChain-SDN: an SDN security framework combining ML-based intrusion detection (Random Forest, XGBoost, CatBoost, CNN-BiLSTM), Hyperledger Fabric for immutable log storage, and application-aware QoS/traffic shaping.
  • Uses permissioned blockchain (Hyperledger Fabric) to store IDS records immutably and privately, claiming tamper-evidence and comprehensive analysis of logs.
  • Implemented/prototyped in Mininet with OpenDaylight/Ryu controllers and evaluated on the InSDN dataset for attack detection and bandwidth allocation under constrained resources.
  • Focuses on improving SDN cybersecurity, regulatory compliance, and management by integrating blockchain-backed logging with ML IDS and application-priority traffic control.

Paper Type

  • Research
